sources.title: The Sighting | Full Movie | Horror Sci-Fi | Sasquatch!
sources.description:
The Sighting - One year after seven local students are inexplicably murdered at a lake house party near the Canadian border, recent high school grads Travis and his buddy Nate plan a celebratory road trip to Canada. While cutting through the woods at night, the two friends are savagely attacked by mysterious creatures and Nate is dragged off leaving Travis- to run for help. After Travis's efforts to save Nate end up in the death of Nate's brother, Chris, the police begin to investigate the events surrounding the deaths. Did things go as Travis claims they did, or are his claims of Sasquatch-like creatures signs of deeper troubles in his world?
2016.  Stars: Adam Pitman, Nathaniel Peterson, Rian Jairell
*Licensed from Level 33. All rights reserved*
